```{r setup,include=FALSE}
rm(list = ls())

library(knitr)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(scales)

opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE, cache = FALSE, warning = FALSE, message = FALSE, comment = '')

source('COVID-19.R')

p1 <- proc_period(df0, '2020-04-02', '2020-04-20')
p2 <- proc_period(df0, '2020-04-21', '2020-05-31')
```

# Период с 2020-04-02 по 2020-04-20

## Инфицированные

```{r fig.align='center',dev='cairo_pdf'}
ggplot(p1$df, aes(date, infected_growth)) +
  geom_col(size = 0.75) +
  geom_point(size = 0.75, color = 'brown') +
  geom_line(aes(date, infected_growth_lm0), size = 0.25, color = 'brown', linetype = 'dashed') +
  scale_x_date(breaks = pretty_breaks(10)) +
  labs(x = '', y = '') +
  ggtitle('Ежедневный прирост инфицированных') +
  theme(plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5))
```

```{r fig.align='center',dev='cairo_pdf'}
ggplot(p1$df, aes(date, infected)) +
  geom_col(size = 0.75) +
  geom_point(size = 0.75, color = 'brown') +
  geom_line(aes(date, infected_lm0), size = 0.25, color = 'brown', linetype = 'dashed') +
  scale_x_date(breaks = pretty_breaks(10)) +
  labs(x = '', y = '') +
  ggtitle('Общее число инфицированных') +
  theme(plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5))
```

```{r fig.align='center',dev='cairo_pdf'}
ggplot(p1$df, aes(date, infected_rate)) +
  geom_col(size = 0.75) +
  geom_point(size = 0.75, color = 'brown') +
  geom_line(aes(date, infected_rate_lm0), color = 'brown', size = 0.25, linetype = 'dashed') +
  scale_x_date(breaks = pretty_breaks(10)) +
  labs(x = '', y = '%') +
  ggtitle('Относительный прирост инфицированных') +
  theme(plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5))
```

## Данные

```{r}

                    'Выздоров.',

                    'Погибш.',

```

```{r}
                    'Выздоров.',

                    'Погибш.',

```
